data.actual_result: Sometimes, Discord doesn't behave like that. It shows a random point of the room containing the new message
data.expected_result: Discord always show the beginning of the new messages chain (the red line showing: "New Messages")
data.short_description: Screen shows messages way above than expected, and need to scroll down to find them
data.steps_to_repro: - activate all messages notification in your phone or computer (both devices fail) - open discord through notification until discord bugges out
